Projects

Culture Educate

Culture-Educate is a rails App built such that When a user is signed_in on Culture-Educate, they can see all created articles classified by categories. Also, the signed_in user can create an article, upvote, and downvote a voted article

Source Code Live Demo

Zattix Online Shop

A static online shop for Electronics with an index page to display all items grouped by category. This was acheived with plain HTML and CSS, and basic Bootstrap.

Source Code Live Demo

Todo App

This is a basic to-do-list app made with Js using Webpack. Users can create projects, assign to-do to a particular project, remove a project, remove to-do, and edit to-do.

Source Code Live Demo

Text Grammar Linter

This project is designed to scan through an input text file and output errors about its structure and typography.
